contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox flag | Name = Uganda | Article = | Image = Flag of Uganda.svg | Use = 111111 | Symbol = | Proportion = 2:3 | Adoption = October 9, 1962 | Design = Six horizontal stripes (of black, yellow, and red; repeated twice); centred on the middle two, a [[Grey Crowned Crane]] within a white disc. | Designer = Grace Ibingira | Type = National }} [[File:Malaysia and Uganda Flags, Trafalgar Square.jpg|thumb|The flag flying behind the [[Flag of Malaysia]], over [[Uganda House]]- the High Commission to the United Kingdom, [[Trafalgar Square]], [[London]].]] The '''flag of [[Uganda]]''' was adopted on 9 October 1962, the date that Uganda became independent from the [[United Kingdom]]. It consists of six equal horizontal bands of black (top), yellow, red, black, yellow, and red (bottom); a white disc is superimposed at the centre and depicts the national symbol, a [[grey crowned crane]], facing the hoist side. The three colours are representative of [[African]] peoples (black), Africa's sunshine (yellow), and African brotherhood (red being the colour of blood, through which all Africans are connected).<ref>{{FOTW|id=ug|title=Uganda}}</ref> The [[grey crowned crane]] is fabled for its gentle nature and was also the military badge of Ugandan soldiers during [[British Empire|British]] rule. The flag was designed by the Ugandan Minister of Justice, Mr. [[Grace Ibingira]]. ==Other flags== <gallery> File:Flag of the Uganda Protectorate.svg|Flag of the Uganda Protectorate (1914-March, 1962) File:Standard of the Governor of the Uganda Protectorate.svg|Standard of the Governor of Uganda (1914 - March, 1962) File:Flag of Uganda 1962.svg|National flag (March - October 9, 1962) File:Presidential Standard of Uganda.svg|Presidential Standard of Uganda </gallery> ==References== {{Reflist}} <br clear=all> {{Africa topic|Flag of|title=[[Flags of Africa]]}} {{nationalflags}}<!-- to edit this table, go to [[Template:Nationalflags]] --> {{DEFAULTSORT:Uganda, Flag of}} [[Category:National symbols of Uganda|Flag]] [[Category:National flags]] [[Category:1962 introductions]] {{uganda-stub}} {{africa-flag-stub}}
